title: How to Make a Windows XP Bootable Disk Using a ISO File

steps.title: Download PowerISO, And install it.
steps.content: Download PowerISO , And install it. You might have to restart your computer after the installation.

steps.title: Double click on your ISO file you want to burn.
steps.content: Double click on your ISO file you want to burn.

steps.title: Use the CD drive to boot from the CD.
steps.content: Use the CD drive to boot from the CD.

steps.title: Right click on the ISO file you want to mount.
steps.content: Right click on the ISO file you want to mount. > Go to PowerISO> Set number of drives> For example 1 drives.

steps.title: Right click on your ISO file you want to mount.
steps.content: Right click on your ISO file you want to mount. > Go to PowerISO> Mount IMG to drive [Letter] >

steps.title: Go to My Computer.
steps.content: Go to My Computer . You will see your mounted CD.
